--- select_count_asterisk.sql
select count(*) from singers
--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      28,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  7,
        end:  15,
        Expr: &parser.CountStarExpr{
          pos: 7,
          end: 15,
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  28,
        Expr: &parser.TableName{
          end:   28,
          Ident: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  21,
            end:  28,
            Name: "singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
        },
        Method: "",
        Num:    nil,
        Rows:   false,
      },
    },
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM singers
